pkgmetadata.longdescription:
OpenCode is an AI-powered coding agent designed specifically for terminal-based development workflows. Built by the creators of SST, it provides intelligent code assistance, completion, and generation capabilities directly in your terminal environment.
Key features: - AI-powered code generation and completion - Terminal-based user interface (TUI) - Support for multiple AI providers (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI, etc.) - Client/server architecture for flexible deployment - Integration with popular development tools (fzf, ripgrep) - Provider-agnostic design for maximum compatibility
OpenCode combines the power of modern language models with a native terminal experience, making it ideal for developers who prefer command-line workflows. Unlike web-based alternatives, OpenCode runs entirely on your machine and can work with local or remote AI providers.
